fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check someone, if they are a Neutral, Deal an Unstoppable attack to them

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All Neutral roles will know you exist at the start of the game.
- You have a 2 use powerful autovest that only works against attacks from Neutral roles.
- If you kill a Neutral that has already won, their win will be revoked.
- You will know all Neutral roles in the game and if they have reached their goal.
- You may spare yourself.
- You will instantly die if 2 neutral roles have completed their goal.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make sure no more than 1 Neutral role wins (Not counting you).
